forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.shortForecast: Mostly Cloudy then Slight Chance Drizzle
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of drizzle after 5am. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 57. West southwest wind 6 to 10 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

forecast.name: Thursday
forecast.shortForecast: Slight Chance Drizzle then Mostly Sunny
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of drizzle before 11am. Mostly sunny. High near 65, with temperatures falling to around 63 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 5 to 14 mph, with gusts as high as 20 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

weather_report:
As the sun descends into the horizon, San Francisco finds itself shrouded in a mild embrace of cloud cover, leaving behind the brassy warmth of the day. There’s a whisper of drizzle expected to kiss the city come early morning, though tonight remains in a gentle stillness, underlined with soft winds from the west, creating a serene ambience. The air is cool, about 57 degrees, inviting a layer for warmth yet still pleasant enough for those who yearn for the late-night stroll.

Tomorrow promises a delicate opening, as the dawn brings with it a hint of sunshine, teasing through the clouds and warming the city to a comfortable 65 degrees. As the afternoon rolls around, temperatures will ease back to 63, a reminder of the ever-changing moods of this coastal beauty. Winds may invigorate the atmosphere with their playful gusts, but a slight chance of drizzle lingers, awaiting another moment of intimacy with the ground.

The city breathes a quiet charm; ideal for a wander amidst its iconic streets, perhaps embracing the fading light with a walk along the waterfront, or indulging in a cozy café nestled in the heart of downtown. Layers will serve as both comfort and practicality, shielding against the cool air while allowing you to relish in the aromas and sights of the evening. Whether one pursues solitude in the company of a good book or gathers in the subtle buzz of conversation with friends, tonight offers a canvas painted in muted tones, inviting moments of reflection and connection.
